extendedInfo.description: 7 days trial versionNavigation which is EASY TO USE. Maps are stored on the phone for offline use. Both app and maps are updated for free.Cyprus on Road have started to sell more countries.EUROPE MAP: Albania, Andorra, Austria, Belarus, Belgium, Bosnia, Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Eire (Republic of Ireland), Estonia, Faroe Islands, Finland, France, Germany, Gibraltar, Greece, Guernsey, Hungary, Iceland, Isle of Man, Italy/Vatican City, Jersey, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macedonia, Malta, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, San Marino, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, The Netherlands, Ukraine and United Kingdom.QUICK INSTALLATION GUIDE* open cyprus-on-road navigation* on some devices you will be ask to choose the installation folder* wait until application finish downloading and installing application data* choose application language and speaker for voice guidance, * in menu "Serial numbers" click on the "+" button* enter your purchased serial number/s, eventually click on one of the trial licenses whose functionality is limited to 7 days (you don't need to activate all of them) or * after successful activation of serial number will be opened menu "Download"* choose maps which you want to install - you can install only maps for activated licenses (serial numbers)* click on the "Refresh" button in right bottom corner to start download and installation* close "Download" menu and start using cyprus-on-road navigation when installation is finishedhttp://www.cyprusonroad.comhttp://www.cyprusgiscenter.com/e-shop/andoid/europe.htmlFor any errors or problems please send an email to info@cyprusgiscenter.comRoute Calculationâ¢	Accurate and fast route calculation / re-calculationâ¢	Route planning according to criteria that can be enabled or disabled (motorways, toll roads)â¢	Route planning in âfastâ or in âshortâ profileâ¢	Road blocking possibilityâ¢	Route calculation according to provided trafficâ¢	Route planner, route itineraryâ¢	Distance to destination with estimated time of arrivalMap Displayâ¢	Clear map visualizationâ¢	Colored map in design and content comparable to paper mapâ¢	Finger-friendly attractive UIâ¢	2D (âbirdâ) perspective view and 3D perspective viewâ¢	Zoom level (camera altitude) reflects current speedâ¢	Day and night color profilesâ¢	Possibility of external data visualizationNavigation Guidanceâ¢	Multi-language voice navigationâ¢	Car and pedestrian modeâ¢	Clear navigation symbolsâ¢	Lane-guidance / Lane assistantâ¢	Speed restrictionsâ¢	Speed camerasSearch Optionsâ¢	Country âcity âstreet âhouse number / junction searchingâ¢	Smart keyboardâ¢	Additional address point database supportâ¢	POI , Points-of-interestâ (incl. my POI) searching based on location or routeSupported Platformsâ¢	Android 2.1., 2.2., 2.3. 4.2â¢	Microsoft Windows Mobile 5 and 6, Microsoft Windows CE 4.2, 5 and 6â¢	Microsoft XP, 7, Vistaâ¢	Apple iOS (March 2012)â¢	Smartphone devicesâ¢	PDA devicesâ¢	PND devicesvisit http://www.cyprusgiscenter.com/english/cyprusonroad/cyprusonroad.htmlFor any errors or problems please send an email to info@cyprusgiscenter.comVisit us on facebook http://www.facebook.com/CyprusOnRoad

reviews.title: Android S3 in North Cyprus
reviews.comment: Using in North Cyprus,  and it really works well. Use Copilot when in Europe, and not up to that standard for clarity and easy menu,  but I\'m sure the developers have high hopes for app. Find the audio directions volume level a little low,  but apart from that a very usable and useful app. I was certainly impressed by the quick response to my query regarding the price. Now on offer at 15 euro, at which price it is good value.
reviews.author: John Kirk

reviews.title: Excellent GPS!!!
reviews.comment: Don\'t listen to the negative reviews. They are from people who want to make a political statement and their reviews have nothing to do with the app itself. I am using it on my note2 and is perfect! Detailed maps, goods directions!
reviews.author: Demetrios Nicolaides

reviews.title: Very good.try it. Free
reviews.comment: People are using this app as a political tool to downgrade this app. Please this latest version of this navigation is superb. It is worth every penny. This app is in multiple languages. I am Turkish but using this app in English.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor GPS.. not worth a cent
reviews.comment: Google maps lattitude on my s3 does a much much much better job even though navigation service not properly activated in Cyprus yet... this is not a good app... I wouldn\'t pay for it... only good thing is they give you a trial to see for yourself...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Europe maps barcelona
reviews.comment: I use it in barcelona spain one week its free  . i found restaurants, metro stations, museums, tourist attraction places,  my hotel, shopping places its  very usefull in europe.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: On holiday in Cyprus and downloaded this to my Note 2. It works brilliantly once you work out how to download the maps. Used it for two complex trips through city centres and it works great. Only downside is the voice sounds like marvin the depressed robot in hitchhikers guide to the galaxy.
reviews.author: julian coy

reviews.title: good application
reviews.comment: very useful with new version

reviews.title: Amazing GPS Software For Cyprus and Europe
reviews.comment: It\'s very good gps software for android users. All coverage cyprus and some other europe cities. Maps are very clear and navigation is very usefull. All places on map and very simple to use it. New version is default language is english and maps in cyprus all place names turkish and greek. Thanks for the developers...five star
